instruction: Compose a convincing email to convince your reader to donate $500 to your charity fundraiser.
output:
Dear Friend,
I’m writing to you today to ask for your support in a charity fundraiser I’m hosting. The funds we will raise will help people in need who are struggling to make ends meet. A donation of $500 would go a long way to make a huge difference in many people’s lives.

Your donation will be used to pay for medical expenses and basic necessities for those in need. It will give people a chance to get the leg up in life that they deserve and help them turn their lives around. 

I hope I can count on your generosity and that you will donate $500 to my fundraiser. Your contribution will not just change one life, but many.

Thank you for your consideration.

Sincerely,
[Name]
